Simple Plan Management

Free to start. Bump up your plan to track additional web maps.

Free Plan

Perfect for smaller projects and testing before deployment.

  • 5k monthly map loads
  • 4 day data history
  • 3 trackable maps
  • 1 trackcode
  • standard support
  • download feature sheet
Developer

Ideal for geogeeks and serious web map builders.

  • 20k monthly map loads
  • unlimited data history
  • 10 trackable maps
  • 1 trackcode
  • premium support
  • download feature sheet
Enterprise

A plan that scales to any size project with premium integrations.

  • 200k monthly map loads
  • unlimited data history
  • unlimited trackable maps
  • 1 trackcode
  • premium support
  • download feature sheet
Frequently Asked Questions

What do you currently integrate with?
We Integrate with Google Maps API, LeafletJS and Open Layers 3.
How do you setup an integration?
Similar to google analytics, Maptiks provides you a tracking code. This code is inserted in the mapping library, and then you're set.
Do you integrate with Google Analytics?
No. Unfortunately it isn't possible at this moment to integrate with Google Analytics. We are working on tag management and analytics.js integrations that will provide better insights in Google Analytics.

In terms of user activities, what do you track?
Maptiks tracks bounce rates, time spent on map, clicks zooms and pans.
Do you track map performance
Yes we provide map performance analytics including load times, error logs and more.
Does maptiks slow down my map? No. Maptiks subscribes to events that are already broadcasted by the mapping library without having to make extra queries.

  • About

  • Maptiks is built for GIS developers and teams who are frustrated by not having enough insights regarding their web maps.
